com.nhn.android.mapviewer.overlay

Class NMapResourceProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nhn.android.mapviewer.overlay.NMapResourceProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NMapPOIitem.ResourceProvider, NMapCalloutCustomOverlay.ResourceProvider, NMapMyLocationOverlay.ResourceProvider, NMapOverlappedPOIdataHandler.ResourceProvider

    public abstract class NMapResourceProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements NMapPOIitem.ResourceProvider, NMapMyLocationOverlay.ResourceProvider, NMapCalloutCustomOverlay.ResourceProvider, NMapOverlappedPOIdataHandler.ResourceProvider
    Base class to provider resources on map view.
